long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Benefits

Focus on generating quality responses instead of wasting time rewriting frequently used prompts.

Create, edit, and re-use prompts without searching through old chats or notes.

–––

Right-click any selected text — up to 10,000 characters — in your browser and click `Save as Prompt` OR click `Create` button to start from scratch.

Click on your prompt to insert it into Chat GPT

Export all your prompts as a JSON file for easy backup and sharing.
